techmeme.title: Yemen says a ship has repaired the subsea AAE-1 cable, linking Asia and Europe, in the Red Sea, and remains in the water to repair the Seacom and EIG cables (Bloomberg)
Israel-based CytoReason, which uses AI to develop disease models, raised $80M from Nvidia, Pfizer, Thermo Fisher, and OurCrowd, and plans a Massachusetts office (Steven Scheer/Reuters)
Human Interest, a 401(k) provider for SMBs that aims to cut down on administration and compliance work, raised $267M in equity and debt at a $1.33B valuation (Katie Roof/Bloomberg)
Hands-on with the Samsung Galaxy Z Fold6's AI-generated "sketch to image" tool: turns rough sketches into images, ridiculous, fun, and slightly worrying (Allison Johnson/The Verge)
Apple device management platform Kandji raised $50M equity and $50M debt from General Catalyst, after raising $100M in 2021, taking its total funding to $288M+ (Ron Miller/TechCrunch)
